title: Get Orin's Netherstone
content:
3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Get Orin's Netherstone Objectives

Head west on the road to Baldur's Gate.

We need to scour the city for clues to Orin's location - murder most foul may be the place to start when tracking a Bhaalist. Orin confronted us in a shapechanged disguise- then teleported away. We should keep looking for clues as to her base of operations.

Search Baldur's Gate for Orin.

Orin, the Lash of Bhaal, is hiding somewhere in Baldur's Gat
